CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 2-12 Nevertheless , the poor sunlight harvesting efficiency and low charge carrier mobility of organic semiconducting materials still hinder the further efficiency improvement of PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

1. Organic semiconducting materials

These are the material name entities mentioned in the paragraph. The text discusses the impact of the poor sunlight harvesting efficiency and low charge carrier mobility of organic semiconducting materials on the efficiency improvement of perovskite solar cells (PSCs).
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. Organic semiconducting materials

This is the only material name entity in the paragraph. The text mentions "organic semiconducting materials" as the subject that has poor sunlight harvesting efficiency and low charge carrier mobility, which affects the efficiency improvement of perovskite solar cells (PSCs). Other terms like "poor sunlight harvesting efficiency" and "low charge carrier mobility" are properties or characteristics of materials, not material names themselves.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 2-12 Nevertheless , the poor sunlight harvesting efficiency and low charge carrier mobility of organic semiconducting materials still hinder the further efficiency improvement of PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

1. "poor sunlight harvesting efficiency" is an entity representing a property name.
2. "low charge carrier mobility" is also an entity representing a property name.

These entities describe the properties of organic semiconducting materials that negatively affect the performance of perovskite solar cells (PSCs).
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. "sunlight harvesting efficiency" is an entity representing a material property.
2. "charge carrier mobility" is also an entity representing a material property.

These two entities are the only ones that clearly refer to material properties in the given paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| poor sunlight harvesting efficiency |
| low charge carrier mobility |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 2-12 Nevertheless , the poor sunlight harvesting efficiency and low charge carrier mobility of organic semiconducting materials still hinder the further efficiency improvement of PSCs.

1. "poor sunlight harvesting efficiency" is a "Property Value" entity.
2. "low charge carrier mobility" is another "Property Value" entity.

These two phrases describe the properties of organic semiconducting materials, which are being compared unfavorably to some unstated standard.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. Sunlight harvesting efficiency
2. Charge carrier mobility

These two phrases are the only ones that clearly refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph. The term "poor" and "low" are qualitative descriptors that indicate the values are below some unstated standard or expectation.
